1.content: Pick the era you wish to change.
1.title: Which series

1111112.content: How young does he get
1111112.title: Male M.U.T.O

11111122.content: Is it instant or gradual
11111122.title: Hatchling

111111221.content:
After releasing his battle cry, Godzilla and the M.U.T.O squared off, after trading several blows the M.U.T.O charged up his claw and struck the Alpha on the snout. Taken back by this Godzilla charged the M.U.T.O grappling with the much smaller creature.

The M.U.T.O realizing he was out matched by the larger predator began to reside himself to his fate, then he started to notice that his predator seemed smaller now, just barely taller than him. Now with the playing field leveled the M.U.T.O began to fight back, as the two evenly sized monsters grappled for control.

Godzilla knew something was wrong, his opponent who was once smaller than him now stood at a even height and seemed to be getting bigger, the M.U.T.O was now taller than him and was easily more stronger.

The M.U.T.O was now pressing down on the shrinking predator as his body regained a youthful appearance and his dorsal plates receded into his body. The M.U.T.O's strength now proved to much as he was pushed onto his smooth back and continued to shrink until his body was pudgy and smooth. The M.U.T.O gazed down at the creature that once was the biggest threat to his kind now he was nothing more than a helpless hatchling.

Godzilla rocked back and forth on his back trying to sit up, he continued to struggle until he felt a terrible sense of dread wash over him, he looked up only to come face to face with his prey, but said prey's head was now bigger than his whole body. Out of fear the little hatchling grabbed his tail and hugged it against his body as he began to shake.

(What now?)
111111221.title: Instant

11111122112.content:
Godzilla continued to shake in fear wondering what his prey turned predator would do to him.

His question was quickly answered as the M.U.T.O launched its head down scooping the squealing hatchling into his mouth. The squealing continued for a moment but was soon silenced as the M.U.T.O began to chew his food. The once mighty Alpha predator that plagued his kind was now nothing more than a bite sized snack that didn't even offer much fulfillment.
11111122112.title: Eat him

111111222.content:
After Godzilla's dramatic entrance into the airport the two titans squared off with Godzilla having the distinct advantage.

The M.U.T.O knew it had to level the playing field so he charged up his claw and slammed it into the side of Godzilla's neck. Godzilla was not even fazed by the attack and continued to pummel the smaller monster. Sensing defeat the M.U.T.O managed to slip out of the predator's grasp and flew away.

Godzilla let loose a mighty roar and began to give chase to his prey all the while not realizing that his body was changing.
(When do the changes continue)
111111222.title: Gradual

1111112221.content:
As the female M.U.T.O prepared the nest her mate was busy keeping the predator away.

As Godzilla arose from the ocean the male M.U.T.O noticed something strange, his predator was now not much larger than him, not just that but his features were softer and his dorsal plated smaller.

Godzilla noticed the height changes as well and took a quick look around his body to see the other changes his body had gone through. By the time he looked back up the M.U.T.O had launched himself at him thus the two tiny titans continued their battle.

(Does he regress now or later)
1111112221.title: San Francisco battle

11111122212.content:
After the female M.U.T.O had finished securing the eggs she sensed the predator approaching her, as she turned to face her foe she was surprised to find that he was smaller than her. The M.U.T.O gazed down at her tiny foe with what could be described as a smug look on her maw.

Godzilla did not waver at the behemoth before him, he would not let what the other prey did slow him down. He let loose a roar to challenge his foe but half way through it cracked and ended as a screech, ignoring the embarrassment he charged forward to grapple but he was swiftly countered and then she began to trample the poor smaller monster.

After trampling him a few minutes more her mate arrived and began to inform her of what happened to cause the changes in their predator. During this Godzilla took the opportunity to try and escape, but the female noticed and decided to try and perform the same attack her mate had, raising her claw she brought it down on the young creature's back knocking him back down in the process.

As Godzilla lay there his eyes suddenly shot open as he felt his body began to change again, his dorsal plates began to recede back into his body, his eyes became larger and more innocent, his size diminished and soon his body started to regain baby fat and his scales took on a lighter color.

The M.U.T.O's watched with glee as the lizard finished his changes now looking like a hatchling little more than a week old. Godzilla stood back up on wobbly legs he looked around in amazement at the structures that he once could crush under his foot now towered over him, as he continued to turn about he soon noticed the ginormous faces of his prey, but then the horrible realization struck him they were no longer prey, he was.

(What do they do to him)
11111122212.title: Later

choices: Put him back in his egg
111111222123.title: Humiliate him

choices: The female wants to raise him
1111112221231.content:
A sinister thought occured to the female so she lowered her claw to the hatchling. Of course Godzilla realized what she was trying to do and immediately turned to run, but was stopped by the Male as he slammed his claw in front of his path.

Godzilla decided to meet his end with pride and let loose a mighty roar that was really just a adorable squeak, but before he could finish it the female thumped his little snout thus resuming the changes. His little body started to secrete a strange mucus that he desperately tried to clean off but soon his stubby legs could no longer hold him causing him to fall, he managed to roll onto his smooth back with the mucus being thrown every where as he kicked and shook his chubby tail. By this point the mucus was several inches thick on his body and was starting to impair his movements, and then it started to harden and take on a black color. Godzilla somehow managed to free his head from the encapsulating shell as piece of said shell formed atop his head making him look as though he just popped out. He let loose a storm of angry chirps at his predators which only resulted in them letting loose something akin to a laugh.

By this time the female had enough of the hatchling's defiance and lowered one of her smaller claws down on top of the hatchling's head where the egg shell was and slowly poked the brat's head back into his shell after a moment more the egg sealed leaving the once mighty alpha predator a helpless defenseless egg.
(What now)
1111112221231.title: Put him back in his egg

111111222123111.content:
The M.U.T.O's watched a few minutes more and just as they were turning to leave they heard a muffled chirp and as they looked back they saw the the egg shake back and forth followed by another chirp. The female let loose a annoyed grunt realizing she wasn't done dealing with the little lizard yet.

Godzilla thrashed about with all his might to try and break free of his cramped enclosure, as he pounded away he began to notice that the once tight confines of the egg was becoming roomier, realizing what was happening he unleashed a storm of pathetic squealing as his body dwindled in the egg.

The M.U.T.O's watched the egg waiting for any changes while muffled squeals continued, until suddenly they abruptly stopped. The female wanting to be absolutely sure he was gone picked up the egg and dropped it, as it made contact with the ground it shattered like glass as the yoke, that was once Godzilla, poured out onto the street.
111111222123111.title: Regress to death

112.content: The monsters or the humans?
112.title: King of the monsters

112311.content:
So instead of the orca being able to communicate with the titans, in this plot it reverts titans to a more "docile" state.

So does it affect Mothra or does it backfire on Emma?
112311.title: A alternative to the orca

1123112.content:
As Emma made her way to the cat walk Mothra continued to thrash about in a fit of fear.

With the other scientists and her daughter watching anxiously from the control room, Emma started the device hoping it would work.

Suddenly a shockwave was sent out from the device, Emma's daughter, Maddison pounded on the glass out of desperation, but the shockwave seemed to release a calming effect on Mothra.

Emma watched the peaceful larva with a resounding since of accomplishment and joy, but that joy soon turned to horror, as she went to deactivate the device she felt a sharp pain shoot throughout her body. As she hunched over on her knees she could feel her clothes loosen around her, her hands that lay on top of the device were now receding back into the sleeves of her lab coat, as she watched the sleeves of her coat flatten atop the device she felt a new disturbance, she could feel a noticeable gap disconnecting her chest from her clothes, all it took was one glance down through the loose neck hole of her shirt to clarify her fears. She jutted her head up fast sending her sweat drenched hair flopping around her head, revealing a much younger face. She reached out to quickly deactivate the device all the while her body was being engulfed by her clothes.

Maddison watched in horror as her mother crawled towards the device with the only thing visible of her being her curly haired head, but soon her lab coat began to drape over her head and then all that was left was a lump in the pile of clothes.
Maddison not being able to withstand it any longer charged out the control room straight towards the pile of clothes.

What does she find?
1123112.title: Emma

135111.content:
After running several experiments on the baby Godzilla G-force believed they had the perfect weapon to defeat Godzilla.

This weapon would over load the healing factor of his G-cells causing them to regress his body to a younger state.
135111.title: A new weapon

1351111.content:
As Godzilla stormed his way to the research center to retrieve the baby, he had already defeated his robotic doppelganger and was now approaching the building.

Suddenly he felt something strange hit his back and he turned his head to look but saw nothing behind him, as he turned back he noticed something stranger, the structure was now slightly taller than him.

He chose to ignore this deciding that the infant was more important, he continued his barrage on the building as it seemed to grow more and more taller to him.

(How young does he get)
1351111.title: Proceed

choices: They are put in a enclosure
They get released into the wild
135111131.content:
Godzilla continued to shrink all the while tearing off chunks of the building on his way down.

He was now much younger having a little pudgy black body he looked very young now perhaps the equivalent of a child for his species.

Godzilla was not happy by this change of events, in a fit of rage he let loose some atomic... bubbles? Godzilla was at a complete loss now, as he continued to shrink he kept up his assault on the building either not realizing or not caring about his predicament.

Soon the shaking stopped, thinking that he had finally left, the group exited the building with Baby in toll. Once outside they heard a strange noise, rounding the corner they came across another hatchling gnawing on a pillar for the building.

But this one was different. This baby stood more upright and his scales were a grayish black but most different were his eyes, they looked almost gold just like...

"Godzilla!" Miki said in shock. As the rest of the group stood at a loss Baby decided to check out the creature that was answering his calls.

He walked all around the other hatchling as it turned his head to look at him. After he finished his examination he let some chirps that sounded alot like laughter. Godzilla was insulted by this and started to chase after the hatchling.

Watching the two hatchlings play made them realize if Baby wasn't a threat than now no longer was Godzilla.

(Now what happens)
135111131.title: Baby Godzilla

info.brief_description: Regress godzilla as far as you want
info.description: You can regress godzilla or any character from his movies. Death is allowed
